sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, createRef } from "react"; class EMIcalculator extends Component { refAmt=createRef(); refInterest=createRef(); refYears=createRef(); refMonths=createRef(); clickHandlerCalculate=()=>{ let amt=this.refAmt.current.value; let interest=this.refInterest.current.value; let years=this.refYears.current.value; let months=this.refMonths.current.value; console.log(amt,interest,years,months) } clickHandlerReset=()=>{ } clickHandlerDetails=()=>{ } render() { return (
EMI Calculator

Loan Amount

Interest %

Period

EMI

Monthly EMI
Total Interest
Total Payment
); } } export default EMIcalculator;
